node.altText: Cyromancers count as Skeletal Mages and receive all of the bonuses they do.
node.description:
Adds {Cryomancers} to the pool of Skeletal Mages that can be summoned. Cryomancers deal cold damage and cast {Ice Shard}.

All poison chance gained from this tree is converted to chill chance for Cryomancers.

nodeList.altText:
The Archmage can be any type of Skeletal Mage or Death Knight.

The modifiers to damage and health are multiplicative with other modifiers.
nodeList.description: You can only summon one Skeletal Mage, an Archmage, that has significantly more maximum health and damage (both multiplicative with other modifiers), fires double the amount of normal projectiles, and is larger.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
Reduces your maximum number of Skeleton Mages to 1.

Increases health and damage by 130%, increases size by 30%, and doubles the number of extra projectiles.
